skins.shipDescription: Mutsuki-class destroyer number two C Kisaragi.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Kisaragi of the Mutsuki-class. I'm always with Mutsuki... I hate planes and Wake Island... I just want to be together with everyone...
skins.acquisition: Com... man... der? Hi, I'm Kisaragi... Uh, umm, uh... I don't taste good, so please don't eat me...
skins.login: Eek! You scared me... I thought a wolf was coming...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Being alone with strangers... is so scary...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wanna play with the other girls in the Thirtieth Destroyer Division...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I hope I haven't caused you any trouble by staying here...
skins.secretaryTouch: Eek! Commander... please don't touch me without warning...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek...! That feels... a little weird...

skins.shipDescription: Kisaragi... retrofitting complete... I want to be able to help everyone out more...
skins.acquisition: Kisaragi... retrofitting complete... I want to be able to help everyone out more...
skins.details: Everyone is really nice to me... Th-that makes me happy, but I can't depend on them forever... I think...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Mutsuki gave me this candy... Commander, w-would you like to have some...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, have I... gotten just a little braver...?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, is there anything I can do to... help you...?

skins.shipDescription: Uh... umm... Commander, is Kisaragi's new outfit... p-pretty? This year, um... Kisaragi wants to work real hard too!
skins.acquisition: Uh... umm... Commander, is Kisaragi's new outfit... p-pretty? This year, um... Kisaragi wants to work real hard too!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I also... want to play with everyone else...
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's a new year... I've gotta try hard to make... um, make ten new friends!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Y-Yuudachi, can I also... join the snow fight?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander... let's have some snacks together?
